data.lyric:
[ti:Best Part of Me(feat. YEBBA)]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/YEBBA]
[al:Best Part of Me (feat. YEBBA)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Best Part of Me (feat. YEBBA) - Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)/YEBBA
[00:06.39]Composed by：Abbey Smith/Benjamin Levin/Ed Sheeran
[00:12.78]My lungs are black my heart is pure
[00:18.36]My hands are scarred from nights before
[00:24.08]And my hair is thin and falling out of all the wrong places
[00:30.04]I am a little insecure
[00:35.86]My eyes are crossed but they're still blue
[00:41.69]I bite my nails and tell the truth
[00:47.39]I go from thin to overweight day to day it fluctuates
[00:53.42]My skin is inked but faded too
[00:58.51]But she loves me she loves me
[01:02.29]Why the hell does she love me when she can have anyone else
[01:10.24]Oh you love me you love me
[01:13.88]Why the hell do you love me 'cause I don't even love myself
[01:22.30]Baby the best part of me is you
[01:33.94]Lately everything's making sense too
[01:42.20]Baby I'm so in love with you
[01:56.46]I overthink and still forgive
[02:02.44]I lose my phone and place my bets
[02:07.98]And I never catch the train on time
[02:11.35]Always thirty minutes behind
[02:14.21]Your worries ain't seen nothing yet
[02:19.10]But you love me you love me
[02:23.15]Why the hell you love me so when you can have anyone else
[02:30.17]Yeah yeah he loves me he loves me
[02:34.31]And I bet he never let's me go and shows me how to love myself
[02:42.65]'Cause baby the best part of me is you oh oh
[02:54.62]Lately everything's making sense too
[03:02.82]Baby I'm so in love with you
[03:06.35]With you
[03:17.99]Baby the best part of me is you
[03:29.64]Lately everything's making sense too
[03:37.92]Baby I'm so in love with you
[03:42.65]Oh baby I'm so in love with you
[03:47.73]Yeah yeah
[03:49.59]Baby I'm so in love with you
data.trans:
[ti:Best Part of Me(feat. YEBBA)]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/YEBBA]
[al:Best Part of Me (feat. YEBBA)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.39]//
[00:12.78]或许我的肺叶早已漆黑 但我的心仍澄澈透明
[00:18.36]满手伤痕 惧怕夜幕降临
[00:24.08]原本稀疏的头发 又为徒劳之事不停脱落
[00:30.04]我是一个有点儿没安全感的人
[00:35.86]眼睛虽转动着 但眼神忧郁
[00:41.69]不安地咬着指甲 说句实话吧
[00:47.39]我的体型从纤瘦变成超重 这波动没有一日停下来
[00:53.42]身上的纹身也日益淡化 逐渐褪去
[00:58.51]但她爱我 她爱这样的我
[01:02.29]她明明有机会选择别人 为什么莫名其妙地对我一往情深呢
[01:10.24]喔 你爱我 爱这样的我 
[01:13.88]你为什么没来由地爱我呢 因为就连我都不爱我自己呀
[01:22.30]宝贝 我人生最美好的事情就是拥有你
[01:33.94]一切似乎都有了意义
[01:42.20]宝贝 我如此地爱你 矢志不渝
[01:56.46]我敏感多疑 仍能获得谅解
[02:02.44]粗心大意丢失手机 冒冒失失就下赌注
[02:07.98]从来不能准时赶上车
[02:11.35]总是迟到半小时
[02:14.21]害你白白担忧
[02:19.10]但你爱我 你还爱这样的我
[02:23.15]你明明有机会选择别人 为什么莫名其妙地对我一往情深呢
[02:30.17]没错 他爱我 他爱这样的我
[02:34.31]我笃定他永远不会舍得我离开 还愿意教会我如何爱自己
[02:42.65]宝贝 我人生最美好的事情就是拥有你
[02:54.62]一切似乎都有了意义
[03:02.82]宝贝 我如此地爱你 矢志不渝
[03:06.35]矢志不渝
[03:17.99]宝贝 我人生最美好的事情就是拥有你
[03:29.64]一切似乎都有了意义
[03:37.92]宝贝 我如此地爱你 矢志不渝
[03:42.65]宝贝 我如此地爱你 矢志不渝
[03:47.73]//
[03:49.59]宝贝 我如此地爱你 矢志不渝
